about_the_game:
This is a small open-world RPG game where players must explore various interactions within the game. By engaging in battles, players can level up and earn talent points. Each level can be completed by finishing all the tasks assigned. In addition, players can engage in farming, fishing, eating, and drinking within the game. It's entirely up to the players to discover their own unique ways of enjoying the game.

How to play :
◆ Press "W", "A", "S", "D" to move.
◆ Hold "E" beside food and bed to recharge vitality.
◆ Hold "E" beside well to recharge stamina.
◆ Hold "F" beside a NPC to fight with him.
◆ Upgrade your level and buy stronger equipments.

Fighting rules :
◆ Attack include heavy attack and light attack.
◆ Attack can minus enemy's vitality but consume your stamina.
◆ Defend can stop enemy's attack without consuming stamina.
◆ Relax can restore stamina but with no defense.
◆ If you are attacked by an enemy, your recovery will be ineffective.

Talent system :
◆ 1 Strength → 120 Vitality and 50 Stamina.
◆ 1 Agility → 5 Attack and 2 Armor.
◆ 1 Intelligence → 20 Crit, 20 Avoid and 40 Lucky.

P.S.
(1) More characters are included in the Premium version.
(2) Game walkthroughs are uploaded to YouTube.
(3) The content has been updated to version 1.5

short_description: When I opened the ancient scroll, I came to the forgotten island. There are medieval figures and buildings on this island. Some people are merchants and some are villagers. First I want to drink water and eat some food, and then explore the island to find a way back to the real world.
